_comment: Calibration settings derived from offseason analysis of weeks 11-16 graded data
_excluded_rationale: player_tds_over had 0% win rate across 1,165 bets - completely broken

over_under_bias._description: Bias corrections applied to confidence. Positive = boost UNDER confidence
over_under_bias._methodology: Based on (UNDER_win_rate - OVER_win_rate) / 2 to split the difference

_bias_note: Applied as: if UNDER bet, boost confidence by bias amount. If OVER bet, reduce by bias amount.

stat_type_bonus._description: Confidence bonus for high-reliability stat types (55%+ historical win rate)
stat_type_bonus._methodology: Conservative bonuses to avoid letting marginal bets through threshold

_stat_bonus_note: Small bonuses - enough to differentiate but not inflate marginal bets

stat_type_penalty._description: Confidence penalty for low-reliability stat types (<50% historical win rate)

_stat_penalty_note: Rec Yds showed 48.4% - slightly worse than coin flip
_anti_predictive_rationale: These agents show 35-36% win rate when agreeing, 59-60% when disagreeing. Signals INVERTED. Trend/Weather/HitRate REMOVED entirely.

agreement_settings._description: When >80% of agents agree, reduce confidence by penalty. When <50% agree, boost by bonus.

stat_type_reliability._description: Win rate from analysis - use for filtering/prioritizing

_recommended_rationale: These stat types have 55%+ historical win rate

agent_weight_adjustments._description: Recommended weight multipliers based on agent predictive power analysis

_agent_note: Matchup showed 38.1% accuracy on strong signals (worse than random). Volume at 44.4%.
